meta.address: Jl. Gading Serpong Boulevard No. 3, Kelapa Dua, Tangerang, Banten, 15810 Indonesia
meta.desc_en:
Serpong Midtown is an integrated superblock facility, which located right in the front of Summarecon Mall Serpong. It means the location cannot be more strategic. Besides that, this superblock also surrounded with other facilities that can support the daily life of Serpong Midtown residents. Namely hospital (St. Carolus and Bethesda Hospital), school & university (Pahoa School, BPK Penabur, Tunas Bangsa, Universitas Media Nusantara, Surya Research & Education Center, Surya University), market, and many more.

Serpong Midtown is highly accessible due to located close to the toll gate that can reach Soekarno-Hatta International Airport only within 20 minutes, JORR and Kebon Jeruk Toll, which increase convenience for the residents to go to work or do other activities.

Serpong Midtown is divided into three parts, Midtown Residence, Midtown Signature, and Commercial district. For the apartment is located in Midtown Residence and Signature, which consists of six towers: Avery Tower, Bryant Tower, Carmel Tower, Dakota Tower, Ellis Tower, and Franklin Tower. While Serpong Midtown Signature has four towers: Galaxy Tower, Herald Tower, Imperial Tower, and Jefferson Tower.
?
There are several types of unit that available in Midtown Residence and Signature. From studio to 3BR. However, the size of the apartment between Residence and Signature is different, although the type is the same. For example 1BR in Midtown Residence is 28 – 30 m2. While, 1BR in  Midtown Signature is 35 – 36 m2.
meta.desc_in:
Serpong Midtown adalah fasilitas superblock terintegrasi, yang terletak tepat di depan Summarecon Mall Serpong. Ini berarti, lokasinya sangat strategis. Selain itu, superblock ini dikelilingi dengan fasilitas penunjang kehidupan sehari-hari. Seperti,  rumah sakit (St. Carolus dan Bethseda Hospital), sekolah dan universitas (Pahoa School, BPK Penabur, Tunas Bangsa, Universitas Media Nusantara, Surya Research & Education Center, Surya University), pasar, dan masih banyak lagi.

Serpong Midtown sangat mudah diakses karena dekat dengan pintu tol, sehingga bisa mencapai Bandara Internasional Soekarno-Hatta dalam 20 menit, Tol JORR dan juga Tol Kebon Jeruk. Tentu saja, ini meningkatkan kenyamanan bagi penghuni Midtown yang ingin bekerja atau menjalani aktivitas lainnya.

Serpong Midtwon terbagi menjadi tiga bagian, Midtown Residence, Midtown Signature, dan Commercial district. Untuk hunian berada di bagian Midtown Residence dan Signature, yang terdiri dari enam tower. Avery Tower, Bryant Tower, Carmel Tower, Dakota Tower, Ellis Tower, and Franklin Tower. Sementara, Midtown Signature terdiri dari empat tower: Galaxy Tower, Herald Tower, Imperial Tower, and Jefferson Tower.

Ada beberapa jenis unit yang tersedia di Midtown Residence dan Signature. Dari studio hingga 3BR. Namun, ukuran unitnya berbeda pada Midtown Residence dan Signature, meskipun tipenya sama. Sebagai contoh: 1BR di Midtown Residence memiliki luas 28 – 30 m2. Sementara, 1BR di Midtown Signature memiliki luas 35 – 36 m2.

meta.address: Jl. Raya Marsekal Surya Dharma No. 68, Neglasari, Tangerang, Banten, Indonesia 15129
meta.desc_en:
Aeropolis Residence is a low-rise apartment complex located just 700 meters away from Soekarno Hatta International Airport complex. It consists of an apartment building, office, retail center, commercial center, hotel, and warehouse.

The apartment consists of 4 towers: Aeropolis Residence 1, Aeropolis Residence 2, Aeropolis Crystal Residence, and Aeropolis Residence 3. Other than that, Aeropolis also provides 105 units of office and retail towers called Aeropolis Commercial Park (ACP) and boutique hotel (300 rooms). The residence also offers 2 shuttle bus facilities to the airport, club house, food center, and Aeropolis Techno Park for cargo warehouse.

Aeropolis Residence has 1 type bedroom with two beds or studio type with 2 bedroom as the occupants' choice which makes an apartment is a perfect place before or after the flight. Aeropolis Residence is a low-end residence which offers peace and serenity towards its occupants.
meta.desc_in:
Aeropolis Residence adalah sebuah kompleks apartemen bertingkat rendah yang berada hanya 700 meter dari bandara Soekarno-Hatta. Aeropolis terdiri dari gedung apartemen, perkantoran, pusat ritel, pusat komersial, hotel, dan gudang.

Apartemen ini terdiri dari 4 tower: Aeropolis Residence 1, Aeropolis Residence 2, Aeropolis Crystal Residence, dan Aeropolis Residence 3. Selain itu juga terdapat 105 unit tower perkantoran dan ritel bernama Aeropolis Commercial Park (ACP) dan hotel butik (300 kamar). Fasilitas yang tersedia antara lain 2 shuttle bus menuju airport, club house, food center, dan Aeropolis Techno Park untuk gudang kargo dan perkantoran.

Aeropolis Residence hanya memiliki tipe 1 kamar tidur dengan 2 ranjang dan tipe studio dengan 2 kamar tidur yang dapat dipilih oleh penghuni sehingga apartemen ini menjadi tempat peristirahatan baik setelah atau sebelum menuju bandara. Aeropolis Residence adalah apartemen dengan harga low-end dengan suasana yang tenang dan nyaman.

meta.address: Jl. Pondok Betung Raya, Bintaro Sektor 3, Pondok Betung, Pondok Aren, Tangerang Selatan, Banten, Indonesia 15221
meta.desc_en:
Bintaro Pavilion, built on an area of 8000 m2 by PT. Megakarya Propertindo, is a single tower apartment located in the Bintaro. This area is in rapid growth phase, which can be seen through availability of offices and shopping malls.

The location of Bintaro Pavilion can be considered strategic because it is close to public transport facilities such as Pondok Ranji Train Station. Plus, there is a shuttle bus available from Bintaro to the center of Jakarta, such as Sudirman.

Bintaro Pavilion also close to hospitals, shopping centers, and schools.

Besides the location, Bintaro Pavilion is also provides internal facilities for its residents. Among others, jogging track, fitness center, swimming pool, salon and spa, and so forth. For the residents who have infants and toddlers, can leave their children in day care.
meta.desc_in:
Bintaro Pavilion, dibangun di atas lahan seluas 8000 m2 oleh PT. Megakarya Propertindo, merupakan apartemen single tower yang berada di kawasan Bintaro. Kawasan ini merupakan daerah yang sedang berkembang dengan pesat.

Lokasi Bintaro Pavilion bisa dikatakan strategis karena dekat dengan fasilitas transportasi umum seperti Stasiun Kereta Api Pondok Ranji. Ditambah lagi ada shuttle bus yang tersedia dari Bintaro ke pusat kota Jakarta, seperti Sudirman.

Bintaro Pavilion juga dekat dengan rumah sakit, pusat perbelanjaan, dan sekolah.

Selain lokasinya, Bintaro Pavilion juga dilengkapi dengan fasilitas internal jogging track, pusat kebugaran, kolam renang, salon dan spa, dan lain sebagainya. Bagi para penghuni yang memiliki anak bayi dan balita, bisa menitipkan anaknya di day care.

Ada beragam tipe unit yang tersedia, mulai dari studio hingga 2BR.

meta.address: Jl. Bintaro Utama 3A No.1, Pondok Karya, Pondok Aren, Kota Tangerang Selatan, Banten, Indonesia 15225
meta.desc_en:
Bintaro Plaza Residence is an ongoing project by PT Jaya Real Property Tbk. It is a superblock project on a 10-hectar land located in the same area with Bintaro Plaza. Bintaro Plaza's Master Plan include a range of residential product, commercial area, retail area, campus, business hotel, and SOHO. Bintaro Plaza Residence is located in the heart of Bintaro that now has well-developed infrastructure. It is located under 7 minutes from Pondok Aren toll exit, 3 minutes to schools and universities, 7 minutes to Premier Bintaro Hospital, 8 minutes to Central Business District, and 10 minutes to Bintaro Jaya Xchange Mall. Bintaro Plaza offers three types of units, which are the studio (25 sqm), 1 BR (35 sqm), and 2 BR (65 sqm). 

The facilities of the apartment consists of swimming pool, gym, multifunction hall, playground, commercial area and Wi-Fi connection. The parking and security facility also guaranteed, the parking area are available both indoor and outdoor, monitored 24 hours by CCTV and the area only can be accessed by using smart card. Bintaro Plaza Residence is a medium end apartment which offers a brand new residence with easy access, great facilities and entertainments to meet modern and dynamic lifestyle.
meta.desc_in:
Bintaro Plaza Residence adalah sebuah proyek berjalan oleh PT Jaya Real Property Tbk. Proyek ini merupakan proyek superblock di atas tanah 10 hektar yang terdapat di dalam kompleks Bintaro Plaza. Master Plan dari Bintaro Plaza terdiri dari kawasan residensial, area komersial, ritel, kampus, hotel, dan SOHO. Bintaro Plaza Residence is  terletak di pusat kota Bintaro yang infrastruktur nya sudah terbangun dengan baik. Lokasinya berada di bawah 7 menit dari exit tol Pondok Aren, 3 menit ke sekolah-sekolah dan universitas, 7 menit ke Rumah Sakit Premier Bintaro, 8 menit ke CBD, dan 10 menit ke Bintaro Jaya Xchange Mall. Bintaro Plaza Residence memiliki tiga tipe unit, yaitu studio (25 m2), 1 kamar tidur (35 m2), dan 2 kamar tidur (65 m2).

Apartemen ini memiliki berbagai fasilitas, seperti kolam renang, pusat kebugaran, ruang serba guna, tempat bermain anak, area komersial, dan koneksi Wifi. Lahan parkir dan fasilitas juga terjamin, karena lahan parkir tersedia di dalam maupun luar ruangan, terawasi oleh kamera pengawas dan area apartemen hanya bisa diakses dengan kartu. Bintaro Plaza Residence adalah apartemen medium end yang menawarkan cara baru untuk menikmati hidup dengan akses mudah ke tempat, fasilitas pendukung dan hiburan untuk memenuhi gaya hidup Anda yang modern dan dinamis.

meta.address: Jl. Lingkar Timur BSD, Serpong, Tangerang, Indonesia 15310
meta.desc_en:
Tuscany Residence is a part of Intermark @ BSD, a mixed use development comprising 5 different properties: Tuscany Residence Apartment, Condotel by Swissbel Hotel, Associate Office Tower, Merdeka Assembly Hall, and Alfresco Dining - Shophouses (Ruko).

Located in Lingkar Timur BSD, right in the first exit of BSD, Intermark @ BSD, easily accessed from Serpong and South Jakarta. It is also in the Tb. Simatupang corridor, which is projected to be the next CBD in Jakarta. Points of interest: Al Azhar, Binus, Prasetya Mulya, Sinar Mas World Academy, SGU, BSD Medika Hospital, Eka Hospital, RS Premiere Bintaro, ITC BSD, Teras Kota, BSD Junction, BSD Square, etc.

Tuscany Residence is a luxurious 20-storey high apartment that offers ad-hoc four-star hotel services and amenities in a modern contemporary architecture and three level basement design. It offers random opening and convenient north-south orientation living place buildings with immediate access to business and leisure within only just steps away at one location.

Tuscany Residence offers Studio, 1+1 BR units, and 2 bedrooms and Executive Suites. The facilities include: swimming pool, gym, convenience store, cafe, restaurants, multi-function room, cable TV, 24-hour security, CCTV & access card, and fiber optic network.
meta.desc_in:
Tuscany Residence adalah bagian dari Intermark @ BSD, sebuah pembangunan mixed use yang terdiri dari 5 properti: Apartemen Tuscany Residence, Kondotel oleh Swissbel Hotel, Gedung Perkantoran Associate, Ruang Serba Guna Merdeka, dan Alfresco Dining - Ruko.

Lokasinya berada di Lingkar Timur BSD, tepat di pintu keluar tol pertama BSD, Intermark @ BSD bisa di akses dengan mudah dari Serpong dan Jakarta Selatan. Lokasinya juga berada di koridor Tb. Simatupang yang di proyeksikan akan menjadi pusat busnis Jakarta yang baru. Point of interest: Al Azhar, Binus, Prasetya Mulya, Sinar Mas World Academy, SGU, RS Medika BSD, Eka Hospital, RS Premier Bintaro, ITC BSD, Teras Kota, BSD Junction, BSD Square, dll.

Tuscany Residence adalah sebuah apartemen mewah 20 lantai di yang menawarkan fasilitas hotel bintang 4 dengan desain arsitektur kontemporer modern dan basement 3 lantai. Desain nya memungkinkan orientasi Utara-Selatan dengan akses mudah yang hanya beberapa langkah ke pusat bisnis dan hiburan.

Unit yang ditawarkan antara lain adalah studio, 1+1 BR, 2 BR, dan Executive Suites. Fasilitas yang tersedia antara lain: kolam renang, gym, toko serba ada, kafe, restoran, ruang serba guna, TV kabel, keamanan 24 jam, CCTV & access card, dan jaringan fiber optic.

meta.address: Jl. Otista Raya No 23, Ciputat, Tangerang Selatan, Indonesia 15411
meta.desc_en:
The Spring Residences is an apartment complex with four towers, namely Springwood, Springhill, Springlake, and Springfield. Although this apartment stands in South Tangerang, however, access to Jakarta's close enough. About 20 minutes to JORR toll road with access to Cawang, Serpong, and Soekarno-Hatta International Airport. Currently, The Spring Residence is quite easy to reach by public transportation includes APTB. Moreover, in a few years, the accessibility of these apartments also increased due to a 20-minute distance to MRT Station Lebak Bulus that currently under construction.

The Spring Residence is equipped with facilities that can support the comfort of the occupants, such as minimarket, swimming pool, and garden. Still, in one complex, this apartment also provides culinary centers, which enable residents to meet the daily consumption, especially those who are busy working.

There are four types of units offered. Among others, studio 22 m2, 1 bedroom 33 m2, 2 bedrooms 44 m2, and 3 bedrooms 67 m2.
meta.desc_in:
The Spring Residences adalah kompleks apartemen dengan empat tower, yaitu Springwood, Springhill, Springlake, dan Springfield. Meskipun apartemen ini berdiri di Tangerang Selatan, namun akses ke Jakarta cukup dekat. Sekitar 20 menit ke Tol JORR ke arah Cawang, Serpong, dan Bandara International Soekarno Hatta. Saat ini, The Spring Residence cukup mudah di jangkau dengan kendaraan umum dan dilewati oleh kendaraan APTB. Selain itu, dalam beberapa tahun, aksesibilitas apartemen ini juga meningkat karena 20 menit ke Stasiun MRT Lebak Bulus.  

The Spring Residence dilengkapi dengan fasilitas yang dapat menunjang kenyamanan penghuninya, seperti minimarket, kolam renang, dan taman. Masih di dalam satu komplek, apartemen ini juga menyediakan taman jajan yang mempermudah penghuni untuk memenuhi konsumsi sehari-hari, terutama mereka yang sibuk bekerja.

Ada empat jenis unit yang ditawarkan. Di antaranya studio dengan luas 22 m2, 1 kamar tidur dengan luas 33 m2, 2 kamar tidur 44 m2, dan 3 kamar tidur 67 m2.

meta.address: Jl. Boulevard Bintaro Jaya, Ruko Kebayoran Arcade Blok C 2 No. 25-26, Bintaro, Pondok Jaya, Tangerang Selatan, Banten 15525
meta.desc_en:
?The Accent is located in Bintaro CBD Sector 7 and has easy access to Sudirman and Thamrin area. The apartment is close to train station and Trans Jakarta shelter to ease its residents to use public transportation. In addition, the apartment is located between Lotte Mall and CIMB Niaga building and close to Premier Bintaro Hospital.
 
The Accent is a single tower apartment built on a 3.300 sqm land. It has 22 floors in total, 10 units per floor, and has approximately 240 units in total.

The first phase of the development consists of 110 units and the types offered are 1 bedroom (39,4 sqm) and 2 bedroom (77,8-81.9 sqm). The Accent features a full range of facilities for its occupants. The facilities include sky pool garden, children playground, commercial area, fitness center, multifunction hall, and 24 hour security.

It is designed by MKPL, a Singaporean architecture company and uses eco design concept that is applied to the whole building system and facade. The Accent is low end apartment and suitable for professional as well as newlyweds with modern and dynamic lifestyle.
meta.desc_in:
The Accent belokasi strategis di CBD Bintaro sektor 7 serta memiliki akses mudah menuju daerah Sudirman dan Thamrin dan dekat dengan stasiun kereta dan halte Trans Jakarta. Selain itu, lokasi apartemen tersebut diapit oleh gedung perkantoran CIMB Niaga dan pusat perbelanjaan Lotte Mall dan berdekatan dengan Rumah Sakit Premier Bintaro. 

The Accent dibangun di atas lahan seluas 3.300 meter persegi. Gedung apartemen satu tower ini memiliki 22 lantai, 10 unit per lantai, dan total sekitar 240 unit. 

Tahap pertama pembangunannya terdiri dari 110 unit dan tipe yang ditawarkan adalah tipe 1 kamar tidur (39,4 m2) dan 2 kamar tidur (77,8-81.9 m2). The Accent juga dilengkapi dengan berbagai fasilitas untuk penghuninya. Fasilitasnya antara lain kolam renang, taman bermain anak, area komersil, pusat kebugaran, ruang serba guna serta keamanan 24 jam.

Gedung ini di desain oleh MKL, sebuah perusahaan arsitektur dari Singapura dan menggunakan konsep eco-design yang diterapkan pada sistem bagunan dan tampak depan gedung. The Accent sangat cocok bagi para profesional dan pasangan muda yang memiliki gaya hidup modern dan dinamis dengan harga low end yang terjangkau.

meta.address: Ruko Golden Road, Blok C 28 No. 35, JL. Pahlawan Seribu, Komplek ITC BSD City, Tangerang, Banten, Indonesia 12790
meta.desc_en:
Using "The Homey Studying Sanctuary' as the tagline, Kubikahomy is a serviced apartment in Edutown BSD-City. The apartment is strategically located, close to schools/universities within Edutown, including Swiss German University (SGU), and Prasetya Mulya University. In addition, the apartment is close to ICE (Indonesia Convention Exhibition) and AEON Mall.

The building is built on a 3.300 sqm land and the total area of the building is 8.000 sqm. There are two types of rooms: Tulip with one bed, total area 19-23 sqm and Lily: 2 bedroom and total area 26-28 sqm. The property also provides various facilities, including ym center, library, mini market, barbeque area, roof garden, and shuttle bus.

The building uses a green building concept and provides a large green outdoor area with green trees and energy saving amenities. With low end affordable price, the apartment is very suitable for university students.

The building is designed to maximize the sunlight, air circulation and water into the building. Asides from that, the advantage of this apartment is Kubikahomy Youth Entrepreneurship (YTE), a program to let the residents choose their interest and then train them to work with professionals Kubikahomy is in collaboration with.
meta.desc_in:
Mengusung tagline 'The Homey Studying Sanctuary", Kubikahomy adalah sebuah serviced apartment yang berada di Edutown BSD-City. Apartemen ini berlokasi sangat strategis, dekat dengan sekolah/universitas di kawasan Edutown ini, antara lain: Swiss German University (SGU), Prasetya Mulya University dll. Dan juga berdekatan dengan ICE (Indonesia Convention Exhibition) dan AEON Mall.

Gedung ini dibangun di atas lahan 3.300 m2 dan luas bangunan 8.000 m2 terdiri dari 2 jenis kamar tidur: Tipe Tulip dengan 1 tempat tidur, luas kamar 19-23 m2 dan tipe Lily dengan 2 tempat tidur dan luas ruangan 26-28 m2. Adapun fasilitas yang tersedia yakni berupa kolam renang, gym center, library, mini market, barbeque area, roof garden dan shuttle bus

Gedung ini menggunakan konsep bangunan hijau yang menyediakan lapangan terbuka dengan pohon-pohon hijau dan hemat energi. Gedung ini di desain sedemikan rupa hingga sinar matahari, sirkulasi udara dan pengelolaan air jadi lebih maksimal. Dengan harga low end yang terjangkau, apartemen ini sangat cocok bagi para mahasiswa.

Selain itu, kelebihan apartemen ini adalah dengan adanya Kubikahomy Youth Entrepreneurship (YTE) sesuai dengan minat penghuni untuk memberikan pelatihan kerja oleh tenaga profesional yang bekerja sama dengan mereka.

meta.address: Jl. Alam Sutera Boulevard, Tangerang, Banten, Indonesia 15325
meta.desc_en:
Yukata Suites is located in Alam Sutera, a town that has malls (Living World, Mall @ Alam Sutera, IKEA), universitiy (Binus), school (Laurensia School), culinary centers (Pasar Delapan, Flavor Bliss), and also commercial and business area in Jl. Sudirman, Alam Sutera.

The area is full of greeneries, with Sutera Loop shuttle bus service, a dedicated cycling and running track all around town, Sports center, and more.

The art of modern Japanese architecture will give you therapy experiences in four dimensions. The unit types are (Mokuzai, Kaza, and Mizu). 2 Bedrooms (73 sqm) and 3 bedrooms (115 sqm). There are also penthouse units with three and four bedroom for residents who seek for more privacy.

Yukata Suites features luxurious facilities, including Kids Pool, Playground, BBQ Pit, Zen Garden, Function Room, Lounge, Contemplation Garden, Reading Area, Indoor Onsen, Outdoor Onsen, 50 meter lap pool, sun deck, private lifts, and more. Each unit uses a smart toilet system.

Yukata Suites is a Japanese concept apartment that uses 5 concept of elements in architecture: Earth, Wind, Water, Wood and Metal. Dengan harga premium, Yukata Suites adalah apartemen eksklusif untuk kalangan menengah ke atas dan warga negara Jepang.
meta.desc_in:
Yukata Suites berada di Alam Sutera, sebuah kota kecil yang memiliki fasilitas lengkap, mulai dari mall (Living World, Mall @ Alam Sutera, IKEA), universitas (Binus), sekolah (Laurensia School), pusat makanan (Pasar Delapan, Flavor Bliss), dan juga area bisnis dan komersial di Jl. Sudirman, Alam Sutera.

Daerah ini masih dipenuhi pohon-pohon dengan fasilitas shuttle bus Sutera Loop, jalur khusus sepeda dan lari, sports center, dan fasilitas lainnya.

Tipe unit nya adalah Mokuzai, Kaza, dan Mizu dengan 2 bedroom (73 m2) dan 3 bedroom (115 m2). Selain itu, terdapat juga tipe penthouse dengan tiga dan empat kamar tidur untuk penghuni yang menginginkan privasi lebih.

Yukata Suites menawarkan fasillitas mewah, antara lain: Kids Pool, Playground, BBQ Pit, Zen Garden, Function Room, Lounge, Contemplation Garden, Reading Area, Indoor Onsen, Outdoor Onsen, 50 meter lap pool, sun deck, private lift, dan masih banyak lagi. Setiap unitnya menggunakan sistem toilet pintar dengan teknologi maju.

Yukata Suites adalah sebuah apartemen dengan konsep Jepang yang menggunakan 5 konsep elemen arsitektur: Bumi, Udara, Air, Kayu dan Besi. Seni Jepang modern yang diaplikasikan pada arsitekturnya akan memberikan pengalaman terapi 4 dimensi. A high end exclusive apartment, Yukata Suites is targetting upscale market and Japanese expatriate.

Casa de Parco is located on the heart of prestigious BSD CIty, close to residential clusters like The Icon, Foresta, Avani, Saveria Apartment, and commercial area from BSD Green Office Park, BSD Central Business District, Indonesia Convention Exhibition, AEON Mall, Swiss German University, Prasetya Mulya Business School, The Breeze, Froggy Castle School, Bethseida Hospital, and many more.

The facilities are: thematic swimming pool, children playground, jogging track, gym, plaza, sky terrace, 7000 sqm park, 24-hour security, CCTV, access card.

Casa de Parco has 4 towers: Orchidea Tower, Magnolia Tower, Gardenia Tower and Cassea Tower. The units of each tower are: Corner Loft, Loft 1, Loft 2, Loft 3, Loft 4, Studio, Studio Corner and 1 Bedroom.

Casa de Parco apartment uses modern and green concept with 4 entrances in 4 sides. With courtyard facilities, there are big open spaces between each tower, giving easy access for the residents to go the the other towers.

With its medium end price, you and your family can enjoy living in one of the best residence in Best Residence in BSD City as well as great investment in the future.
meta.desc_in:
Casa de Parco terletak area prestisius di pusat BSD CIty, dekat ke pemukiman seperti The Icon, Foresta, Avani, Saveria Apartment, dan area komersial dari BSD Green Office Park, BSD Central Business District, Indonesia Convention Exhibition, AEON Mall, Swiss German University, Prasetya Mulya Business School, The Breeze, Froggy Castle School, Bethseida Hospital, dan masih banyak lagi.

Casa de Parco memiliki total 4 tower: Tower Orchidea, Tower Magnolia, Tower Gardenia dan Tower Cassea. Tipe unit yang berada di setiap tower adalah: Corner Loft, Loft 1, Loft 2, Loft 3, Loft 4, Studio, Studio Corner and 1 Bedroom. 

Fasilitasnya adalah: kolam renang dengan tema, taman bermain anak, jogging track, gym, plaza, sky terrace, taman seluas 700 m2, keamanan 24 jam, CCTV, kartu akses., 23-hour security, CCTV, access card.

Casa de Parco menggunakan konsep modern dan hijau dengan 4 pintu masuk dari 4 sisi berbeda Dengan fasilitas taman besar dan area terbuka di antara semua tower, penghuni jadi lebih mudah berinteraksi dan bersosialisasi dengan penghuni dari tower-tower lain. 

Dengan harga medium end, Anda sekeluarga dapat leluasa menikmati kenyamanan gaya hidup modern bernuansa alam di salah satu hunian pilihan terbaik di BSD CIty sekaligus pilihan tepat dalam berinvestasi.

meta.desc_en:
Silk Town Apartment is located in Jalan Bhayangkara, Alam Sutera, Tangerang, Banten. The location is very strategic because it is close to the Mall Alam Sutera, Flavor Bliss, the Omni International Hospital, Binus University, shopping centers, and St. Laurensia School.

Silk Town Apartment is using the concept of a mixed-used development, which built 12 ha land in the most developed area of Alam Sutera. In this area, there are several high-rise towers consisting of condominiums, offices, SOHO, shopping arcades and other commercial areas. This apartment also has additional value, which is a close distance to the toll gate.

Silk Town Apartment offers various of facilities. Among others, infinity swimming pool, exclusive function room, fitness center, sky garden, BBQ Pavilions, children playground, mini market, and laundry center. For the security aspect, the occupants will receive the smart access card, and the apartment provides 24-hour security personnel and CCTV. The management also considered about comfort inside the unit by providing internet access and TV cable subscription.

There are three types of unit available in Silk Town Apartment, which are the studio (A,B,C, D, E, F, G, H, I), 1BR (A, B, C, D, E), and 2BR (A, D, E).
meta.desc_in:
Silk Town Apartment terletak di Jalan Bhayangkara, Alam Sutera, Tangerang Selatan, Banten. Lokasi ini sangat strategis karena dekat dengan Mall Alam Sutera, Flavor Bliss, Rumah Sakit Omni Internasional, Binus University, pusat perbelanjaan, dan St. Laurensia School.

Kawasan Silk Town Apartment menggunakan konsep mixed-used development terbaru yang dikembangkan pada lahan seluas lebih dari 12 hektar. Di dalam kawasan ini ada beberapa high rise tower yang terdiri atas kondominium, perkantoran, SOHO, shopping arcade dan area komersial lain. Lokasinya juga lebih strategis lagi karena dekat dengan pintu tol Alam Sutera.

Silk Town Apartment menawarkan beragam fasilitas, di antaranya infinity swimming pool, ruang serbaguna eksklusif, pusat kebugaran, sky garden, pavilliun BBQ, taman bermain anak, mini market, dan laundry. Sedangkan untuk aspek keamanan, apartemen ini dilengkapi dengan smart access card, sekuriti 24 jam, dan CCTV. Di dalam unit apartemen penghuni juga bisa menikmati fasilitas lainnya, seperti akses internet dan TV kabel.

Ada tiga tipe unit yang ditawarkan yaitu studio (A,B,C, D, E, F, G, H, I), 1BR (A, B, C, D, E), dan 2BR (A, D, E).

meta.address: Jl. Jalur Sutera Kav. 16a No. 26, Alam Sutera, Tangerang, Jawa Barat, Indonesia 15325
meta.desc_en:
Saumata Suites is an exclusive apartment in Alam Sutera, Tangerang. Built on a 1-hectare land, it offers 132 units of apartment and 6 penthouse units.

Saumata is surrounded by lively neighbourhood and meet everything you need, such as IKEA, Mall Alam Sutera, Living World, Flavor Bliss, Binus campus, St. Laurensia School, Sports Club, The Prominence Office Tower, Omni Hospital, Pasar 8 traditional market, Aeon Mall, and Living World Mall.

The unit types are: 3BR- units of 149,3 square meter and Penthouse units of 312,10 square meter.  Each floor will have 4 units of 3BR- units and only 2 penthouse units per floor. In addition, Saumata Suites indulges its residents with a full range of facilities, including infinity pool, library, function room, and lounge. The swimming pool area will be used as a lookout point of the two facing towers.

Standing tall at 40 floors, the building is set to be the tallest in Alam Sutera. The facade will be covered by gold fins and a vertical precast used for sun shading.

Saumata is high end apartment and has luxurious and modern design which tastefully composed.

Saumata dikelilingi oleh lingkungan yang telah bekembang dan memenuhi segala kebutuhan Anda, seperti IKEA, Mall Alam Sutera, Living World, Flavor Bliss, kampus Binus, St. Laurensia School, Sports Club, The Prominence Office Tower, Omni Hospital, Pasar 8, Aeon Mall, dan Living World Mall.

Tipe unit nya adalah: unit 3 kamar tidur (149,3 meter persegi) dan unit penthouse (312,10 meter persegi). Setiap lantai memiliki 4 unit 3 kamar tidur dan hanya 2 unit penthouse. Selain itu, Saumata memanjakan penghuninya dengan beragam fasilitas, seperti kolam renang infinit ukuran 9x28 meter, perpustakaan, ruang serba guna, dan lounge di lantai yang sama. Area kolam renang akan berfungsi sebagai lookout point untuk dua menara yang saling berhadapan

Dengan tinggi 40 lantai, gedung ini akan menjadi gedung paling tinggi di Alam Sutera. Tampak depan gedung akan dilapisi oleh lapisan fin emas di beberapa bagiannya dan ada vertical precast yang digunakan untuk menghalangi sinar matahari.

Saumata merupakan apartemen high end yang mengedepankan desain mewah dan modern yang terkomposisi dengan seksama

meta.address: Jl. Raya Kelapa Dua Blok A No. 20 Gading Serpong, Tangerang, Banten, Indonesia 15810

Majestic Point is an apartment that strategically located in Serpong because the location is right in the middle of golden triangle Karawaci, Serpong, and BSD. The three area that currently growing very rapid and significant. Moreover, the apartment also has close access within minutes to public facilities, such as renowned schools and colleges, international hospitals, malls, and close to the toll road.
 
Majestic Point has a unique design, modern, and luxurious. Even more interesting, Majestic Point also provides education center for activities or courses for the residents of the apartment.
 
Also, Majestic Point also provides a sky lounge and a garden on the floor 19A with stunning city views. There are also other facilities such as swimming pool, basketball court, gym, jogging track and children's playground.
 
For you who are interested, Majestic Point provides various types of units, including studio (27 sqm), 1 BR (40 sqm), and 2 BR (54 sqm).

Majestic Point memiliki desain unik, modern, dan mewah. Yang lebih menarik lagi, Majestik Point juga menyediakan fasilitas education center untuk aktivitas/kursus bagi penghuni apartemen.
 
Selain itu, Majestic Point juga menyediakan sky lounge dan garden di lantai 19A dengan pemandangan kota yang menakjubkan. Ditunjang oleh fasilitas lainnya seperti kolam renang, lapangan basket, gym, jogging track, dan taman bermain anak.

meta.address: Jl. Ciater Raya, Serpong, Kota Tangerang Selatan, Banten, Indonesia 15310
meta.desc_en:
Built on 1.1 land, right in the heart of South Tangerang, Urban heights Residences is a two-tower apartment with tropical concepts. It is 39% building and 61% green area.

Located in the area that connects Pamulang with BSD CBD, Urban Heights Residence is only 2 minutes from BSD toll exit, 10 minutes to BSD business district, 15 minutes to Bintaro business district, and 30 minutes away from Simatupang business district. The property is also surrounded by shopping center and entertainment center (ITC BSD, Teras Kota, Giant, BSD Square), eduaction center (St. Ursula school, Al Azhar Islamic School, Swiss German University, Prasetya Mulya Business School), and hopital (Eka Hospital, Medica BSD).  

The apartment provides choice of type studio 22.65 sqm, 1BR standard 29.95 sqm, 1 BR corner 32.05 sqm, and 2 BR 40.90 sqm and 2 BR corner 41.15 sqm. It also equipped by extensive facilities, including swimming pool, roof garden, sky lounge, café, restaurant, spa, sauna, gym, security, parking, internet, playground, commercial area.

Commercial apartment with premium location, Urban Heights presents as low end residence to meet the requirement of perfect residence as well as good investment while providing comfort and the simple of life.
meta.desc_in:
Dibangun di atas lahan 1.1 hektar, tepat di jantung kota Tangerang Selatan, Urban Heights Residences merupakan apartemen 2 tower dengan konsep dan nuansa tropis. Gedung ini diisi 39% bangunan dan 61% area hijau.

Berlokasi di jalan yang merupakan penghubung antara Ibukota Tangerang Selatan (Pamulang) dan pusat bisnis BSD, Urban Heights Residence berada hanya 2 menit dari pintu keluar tol BSD, 10 menit dari sentra bisnis BSD, 15 menit dari sentra bisnis Bintaro, dan berjarak 30 menit dari sentra bisnis Simatupang. Apartemen ini juga dikelilingi oleh pusat hiburan dan perbelanjaan (ITC BSD, Teras Kota, Giant, BSD Square), pusat pendidikan (St. Ursula, Al Azhar, Swiss German Islamic School, Prasetya Mulya Business School) serta rumah sakit (RS Eka, Medica BSD).

Unit yang ditawarkan apartemen ini adalah tipe Studio 22.65 m2, 1BR standard seluas 29.95 m2, 1 BR corner 32.05 m2, dan 2 BR seluas 40.90 m2 dan 2 BR corner seluas 41.15 m2. Hunian ini juga dilengkapi dengan berbagai fasilitas, termasuk kolam renang tropical lagoon, akses finger print untuk masuk, kolam renang tropis, spa, sauna, tempat olahraga, taman bermain anak-anak, roof garden, sky lounge, kafe, restoran, internet, TC kabel, dan area komersial. 

Apartemen komersial dengan lokasi premium, Urban Heights hadir dengan harga low end untuk memenuhi kebutuhan hunian dan investasi Anda serta akan memberikan kenyamanan serta kemudahan dalam hidup.

meta.desc_en:
Built on 1.7 hecater land, ARA Center is a mixed-use project by Paramount Land in Gading Serpong. It consists of six towers: four apartment towers, one ARA Hotel tower, and 1 Matana University campus tower. ARA Center is located about 50 meters from Summarecon Mall Serpong, 100 meters from Atria Hotel & Conference Center, and other commercial areas. With the easy access fom Kebon Jeruk-Tangerang, direct access to BSD City, Lippo Karawaci, and Alam Sutera, it is no longer a hassle to live in Gading Serpong.

ARA Center consists the most complete and impressive facilities, including swimming pool, children playground, basketball court, futsal court, mini golf, clinic, gym station, laundry, restaurant, dan convenience Store. Semua fasilitas tersebut membuat Anda semakin nyaman untuk tinggal di ARA Center.

The units offered are Studio (27,40 sqm - 28,29 sqm), 1 Bedroom (41,55 sqm - 42,43 sqm), and 2 Bedroom (55,86 sqm - 56,57 sqm). From 281 units, 242 units are studio, 24 units are 1 bedroom, and 15 units are 2 bedroom. 

ARA Center is medium end 3+ stars condominium which has detail design for your comfort. With all the elegance and panoramic view surrounding ARA Center, the apartment is perfect residence for you as well as promising investment.
meta.desc_in:
Dibangun di atas lahan seluas 1,7 hektar, ARA Center adalah proyek mixed-use di Gading Serpong yang terdiri dari enam tower: empat tower apartemen, satu tower hotel ARA, dan satu tower kampus Universitas Matana. ARA Center berada sekitar 50 meter dari Summarecon Mall Serpong, 100 meter dari Atria Hotel & Conference dan area-area komersial lainnya. Dengan sudah mudahnya akses tol Kebon Jeruk-Tangerang, akses langsung ke BSD City, Lippo Karawaci, Alam Sutera juga menjadi lebih mudah.

ARA Center dilengkapi fasilitas yang begitu lengkap, seperti kolam renang, tempat bermain anak, lapangan basket, lapangan futsal, klinik, pusat kebugaran, laundry, restoran, serta mini market. Semua fasilitas tersebut membuat Anda semakin nyaman untuk tinggal di ARA Center.

Tipe unit yang ditawarkan adalah Studio ( 27,40 m2 - 28,29 m2), satu kamar tidur (41,55 m2 - 42,43 m2), dua kamar tidur (55,86 m2 - 56,57 m2). Dari 281 unit, ada 242 unit untuk tipe studio, 24 unit satu kamar tidur, dan 15 unit tipe dua kamar tidur.

ARA Center adalah kondominium bintang 3+ dengan harga medium end yang didesain secara detail untuk kenyamanan Anda. Dengan Semua keindahan fasilitas serta lingkungan pemandangan kota yang tersedia di ARA Center, apartemen ini merupakan dapat menjadi hunian pilihan Anda sekaligus investasi yang menjanjikan,

meta.desc_en:
Akasa Pure Living is one of the apartments in the Tangerang area. This apartment has direct access to all major highways in the Greater Jakarta. Also, the residence can reach the train and bus services quickly.
 
Akasa Pure Living is also close to public facilities such as hospital (Eka Hospital, Medica BSD, RS THT Proklamasi), malls (AEON Mall, ITC BSD, BSD Square, Teraskota, Modern Market), universities and schools (Swiss Germany University, Presetiya Mulya, BSI, Santa Ursula, Ora Et Labora, Deutsch Schule, Al Azhar School, IULI, IPEKA, Atmajaya University, BINUS, JNS), commercial area (SD Green Office Park, ICE BSD Convention Center, Artajasa, Smart Telecom, Auto Part, Sunburst Office Park, CBD BSD Commercial Park, Foresta Business Loft).
 
Type of units offered Akasa Pure Living among others, Studio, 1 Bedroom, and 2 Bedroom.
 
Facilities owned by Akasa Pure Living is a commercial area, arcade, swimming pool, children's playground, jogging track, gym, sky and roof garden, 24-hour security, discovery park, nursery park, digital park, and more.
meta.desc_in:
Akasa Pure Living adalah salah satu apartemen yang berada di kawasan Tangerang. Apartemen ini memiliki akses langsung keseluruh jalan tol utama di wilayah Jabodetabek. Selain itu, hunian ini bisa menjangkau layanan kereta api dan bus dengan cepat.
 
Akasa Pure Living juga dekat dengan fasilitas umum seperti rumah sakit (Eka Hospital, Medica BSD, RS THT Proklamasi), pusat perbelanjaan (AEON Mall, ITC BSD, BSD Square, Teraskota, Modern Market), universitas dan sekolah (Swiss Germany University, Presetiya Mulya, BSI, Santa Ursula, Ora At Labora, Deutsch Schule, Al Azhar School, IULI, IPEKA, Atmajaya University, BINUS, JNS), dan area komersial (SD Green Office Park, ICE BSD Convention Center, Artajasa, Smart Telecom, Auto Part, Sunburst Office Park, CBD BSD Commecial Park, Foresta Business Loft).
 
Tipe unit yang ditawarkan Akasa Pure Living antara lain, Studio, 1 Bedroom, dan 2 Bedroom.
 
Fasilitas yang dimiliki oleh Akasa Pure Living adalah commercial area, arcade, kolam renang, taman bermain anak, jogging track, gym, sky & roof garden, 24 jam keamanan, discovery park, nursery park, digital park, dan lainnya.

meta.address: Jl. Boulevard Alam Sutera, Tangeran, Banten, Indonesia, 15325
meta.desc_en:
The Smith is the first soho with 3.0 concept in Indonesia and equipped with Silicon Valley-esque standrad of facilities. Located in Alam Sutera CBD, the location allows easy access to the toll road, shopping malls (IKEA, Mall Alam Sutera, Living World), hospitals (Omni Hospital, Eka Hospitals), school (Laurensia School), traditional market, and more.

The Smith is a mixed-use development that consists of 280 unit of apartment, 160 units of SoHo, and 60 units of office. The apartment has a total 336 units of type one bedroom (36 sqm), one bedroom plus (63), and two bedroom (97 sqm). In addition, the apartment is equipped with kitchen set with marble top-table finishing, marble floor, and 300 parking low as well as 8 lifts.

The apartment consists of extensive facilities for its residents' convenienec, including rooftop bar, lounge, game room, sky pool, hanging garden, fitness lounge, coffee shop dan indoor Garden Plaza.

The Smith is modern apartment to boost young entrepreneur way of living. With its medium end price, it is suitable for students, professional, and promising investment.
meta.desc_in:
The Smith merupakan soho dengan konsep 3.0 pertama di indonesia yang dilengkapi dengan fasilitas sekelas 'Silicon Valley' di San Francisco. Berada di pusat bisnis Alam Sutera, lokasi ini memberikan akses mudah ke jalan tol menuju Jakarta, mall (IKEA, Mall Alam Sutera, Living World), rumah sakit (Omni, Eka), sekolah (Sekolah Laurensia), pasar tradisional, dll.

The Smith adalah sebuah pembangunan mixed-use yang terdiri dari 280 unit apartemen, 160 unit SoHo, dan 60 unit perkantoran. Apartemen The Smith mempunyai 336 unit apartemen yang terdiri dari tiga tipe unit yaitu adalah 1 bedroom 36 m2, 1 bedroom plus 63 m2, 2 bedroom 97m2. Selain itu adanya, tambahan spesifikasi premium seperti dari lantai marmer, air conditioner, premium kitchen set, sanitair dengan brand Grohe, tersedianya 300 parking lot dan 8 lift.

Apartemen ini juga diengkapi dengan berbagai fasilitas untuk kenyamanan penghuninya, seperti rooftop bar, lounge, game room, sky pool, hanging garden, fitness lounge, coffee shop dan indoor Garden Plaza.

The Smith merupakan hunian dengan gaya modern yang menunjang kehidupan pebisnis muda. Dengan harga medium end, apartemen ini dapat menjadi pilihan yang sempurna bagi mahasiswa, profesional muda maupun sebagai investasi.

meta.address: Jl. M. H. Thamrin No. 7  Cikokol, Serpong, Tangerang, Banten, Indonesia 15117
meta.desc_en:
Tree Park City is one of the apartments in the area of Tangerang. Because of its strategic location on the main road, M. Thamrin, making the apartment dwellers can access the toll roads of Jakarta - Merak - Kebon Jeruk - quickly. In addition, Fly Over Cikokol - Gading Serpong can be reached in a matter of minutes. It also only 10 minutes to Bandara International Soekarno-Hatta.
 
Tree Park City dwellers can get daily necessities and monthly, in Carrefour Cikokol.
 
In addition to its strategic location, Tree Park City offer full facilities. Among other things, a ballroom, SOHO, a large parking area, swimming pools, sports centers, CCTV, cafe, restaurant, and 24-hour security.
 
Types of apartment unit that offered are also very diverse, including Unit Type Studio (24.84 sqm) 20 units per floor and Unit Type 2 Bedroom (52.51 sqm) three units per floor.
meta.desc_in:
Tree Park City adalah salah satu apartemen yang berada di kawasan Tangerang. Lokasinya strategis karena berada di jalan utama, M. Thamrin, membuat penghuni apartemen bisa mengakses jalan Tol Jakarta – Merak – Kebon Jeruk – dengan cepat. Selain itu, Fly Over Cikokol – Gading Serpong dapat dicapai dalam hitungan menit. Apartemen ini juga hanya 10 menit ke Bandara Internasional Soekarno Hatta.
 
Penghuni Tree Park City bisa mendapatkan kebutuhan sehari-hari dan bulanan, di Carrefour Cikokol.
 
Selain lokasinya yang strategis, Tree Park City menyediakan fasilitas lengkap. Antara lain, ruang serbaguna, SOHO, area parkir yang luas, kolam renang, pusat olahraga, CCTV, cafe, restaurant, dan keamanan 24 jam.
 
Tipe unit apartemen yang ditawarkan juga sangat beragam, antara lain Tipe Unit Studio (24,84 m2) sejumlah 20 unit per lantai dan Tipe Unit 2 Bedroom (52,51 m2) sejumlah tiga unit per lantai.

meta.address: Jl. BSD Boulevard, Parcel 55-F, GRAND CBD BSD City, Tangerang, Banten, Indonesia 15339
meta.desc_en:
Branz BSD is the tallest building at the heart of Grand CBD BSD based on BSD city plan November 2015. It has easy access to several important locations such as Soekarno Hatta International Airport, Pondok Indah, Kuningan, Pluit and many others.

It also located near various entertainment, education, health and business center in BSD, some of them are Swiss Germany University, Prasetya Mulya University, and many more. This apartment lies straight across AEON Mall which is located only 3 minutes by walking.

Branz BSD employs earthquake resistance structure and Japanese architerctural looks. This apartment offers various complete facilities to make the resident's lifes more comfortable. Here are some of the facilities: relaxing place, restaurant and cafe, fitness center, indoor and outdoor swimming pools, meetng rooms, party rooms, library, spa, bar, karaoke, minimart and playroom. In addition to that, there are facilities provided for family's entertainment, like grassy playground, indoor playground, children swimming pool and bicycle rental.

The selection of units provided, including one room type, two room type, and three room type. Each has its own size and amenities.

With every privilege it offers, Branz BSD is one of the apartment to be taken into account for those looking for a good place to live.
meta.desc_in:
Branz BSD merupakan gedung tertinggi yang terletak strategis di jantung kota Grand CBD BSD menurut BSD city plan bulan November 2015. Lokasinya memiliki akses mudah ke beberapa lokasi penting seperti Bandara Internasional Soekarno Hatta, Pondok Indah, Kuningan, Pluit dan lain sebagainya.

Lokasinya juga dekat dengan berbagai macam tempat-tempat hiburan, edukasi, kesehatan hingga bisnis yang berada di BSD, beberapa diantaranya seperti Swiss Germany University, Universitas Prasetiya Mulya, dan lain-lain. Apartemen ini berlokasi tepat diseberang AEON Mall dengan jarak tempuh hanya 3 menit berjalan kaki.  

Branz BSD mengusung teknologi bangunan anti gempa dan arsitektural khas Jepang. Apartemen ini menawarkan beragam fasilitas lengkap untuk membuat kehidupan penghuninya semakin nyaman. Fasilitas yang ditawarkan mulai dari tempat bersantai, restoran dan kafe, pusat kebugaran, kolam renang indoor dan outdoor, ruang meeting, ruang pesta, perpustakaan, tempat spa, bar, karaoke, minimart hingga ruangan permainan. Selain itu, ada juga fasilitas yang khusus disediakan untuk keluarga seperti tempat bermain berumput, tempat bermain dalam ruangan. kolam renang anak, hingga penyewaaan sepeda.

Adapun tipe unit yang dipasarkan meliputi, tipe satu kamar, tipe dua kamar, hingga tipe tiga kamar. Masing-masing memiliki luas dan fasilitas yang berbeda.

Dengan segala keunggulannya, Branz BSD merupakan salah satu apartemen yang patut diperhitungkan bagi Anda yang sedang mencari tempat tinggal.

meta.address: Jl. Scientia Raya Summarecon, Ruko Dalton Blok DLNU 31-32, Gading Serpong, Tangerang, Indonesia
meta.desc_en:
Grand Eschol Residence is an apartment complex that built in a strategic location in Karawaci, Tangerang. This apartment is standing right behind the Universitas Pelita Harapan. Also, the apartment is also close to Lippo Supermall Karawaci, Gading Serpong Summarecon Mall, Mall Living World Alam Sutera, and Toll Gate to Jakarta and Merak.
 
This apartment has only one tower consisting of 25 floors with three basements as a parking lot. The total unit provided is 720 units.
 
Grand Eschol Karawaci has quite complete facilities, among others, children's pool, adult pool, sky terrace, meeting rooms, a ballroom, gym, cafe, restaurant, mini market, free maintenance for one year, cable tv, and smart key access.
 
Grand Eschol offers several types of units, namely Studio (Cottonwood (31.3 sqm), Ottawa (27.6 sqm), and Type Belvoir (35.5 sqm)) and 2 Bedroom (Grand Canyon (51.5 sqm), Vinales (50.5 sqm) and Rhine (49.1 sqm)).
meta.desc_in:
Grand Eschol Residence adalah kompleks apartemen yang terletak di lokasi strategis di Karawaci, Tangerang. Apartemen ini berada tepat di belakang Universitas Pelita Harapan. Selain itu, apartemen ini juga dekat dengan Lippo Supermall Karawaci, Summarecon Mall Gading Serpong, Mall Living World Alam Sutera, dan Pintu Tol ke Jakarta dan Merak.
 
Apartemen ini hanya mempunyai satu tower apartemen yang terdiri dari 25 lantai dengan tiga basement sebagai lahan parkir. Total unit yang tersedia adalah 720 unit.
 
Grand Eschol Karawaci memiliki fasilitas yang cukup lembab, antara lain kolam renang anak- anak, kolam renang dewasa, sky terrace, ruang meeting, ruang serbaguna, gym, cafe, restaurant, minimarket, free maintenance selama satu tahun, tv kabel, dan smart key access.
 
Grand Eschol menawarkan beberapa tipe unit, yaitu Studio (Cottonwood (31.3 m2), Ottawa (27.6 m2), dan Belvoir (35,5 m2)) dan 2 Bedroom (Grand Canyon (51.5 m2), Vinales (50,5 m2), dan Rhine (49,1 m2)).

meta.address: Jl. Parung Jaya No.34, Tangerang, Indonesia 15157
meta.desc_en:
Strategically located in Karang Tengah, Metro Garden apartment has direct access to Karang Tengah tollroad, making it easy for its residents to go to Jakarta or towards Soeakarno Hatta International Airport.

This apartment only located minutes away from two big shopping center in the area, Puri Indah Mall and Lippo Mall.

Some of the facilities this apartment offers, including: swimming pool, gym, function hall, minimarket, meeting room, restaurant, playground, jogging track, BBQ area, 24-hour security with acces card and CCTV, and many others.

This apartment is still in construction work.
meta.desc_in:
Berlokasi strategis di Karang Tengah, Apartemen Metro Garden memiliki akses langsung menuju tol Karang Tengah. Hal ini sangat memudahkan para penghuninya untuk bepergian baik ke arah Jakarta, maupun ke arah bandar udara Soekarno Hatta.

Apartemen ini juga berjarak hitungan menit dari dua pusat perbelanjaan besar di daerahnya, yaitu Mall Puri Indah dan Mall Lippo.

Berikut fasilitas-fasilitas yang ditawarkan oleh apartemen ini: kolam renang, pusat kebugaran, hall serbaguna, minimarket, ruang rapat, restoran, taman bermain, trek jogging, area BBQ, keamanan 24 jam dengan kartu akses dan CCTV dan masih banyak lagi.

Apartemen ini masih dalam tahap pembangunan.

meta.address: Jl. Daan Mogot Raya KM 19,6, Batu Ceper, Tangerang, Banten, Indonesia 15122
meta.desc_en:
Raya km 19.6. This location is strategic because it can reach Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, Tangerang, Toll JORR, Alam Sutera Mall, and Pantai Indah Kapuk in a short time.
 
Padina Residence is built over an area of 4.181 m2 with two towers. A total unit that available in this apartment is 338.
 
To increase the comfort of its residents, Padina Residence provides facilities such as swimming pool, Jacuzzi, retail / mini market, laundry, ballroom, google room with very fast internet access, gym, children's playground, and many more.
 
Types of apartment unit offered by Padina Residence are diverse, among other 1BR, 2BR, and loft.
meta.desc_in:
Padina Residence adalah salah satu hunian terpadu yang berada di Jakarta Barat, tepatnya di Jl. Daan Mogot Raya km 19,6. Lokasi ini cukup strategis karena bisa mencapai Bandara Internasional Soekarno-Hatta, Tangerang, Toll JORR, Mall Alam Sutera, dan Pantai Indah Kapuk dalam waktu singkat.
 
Padina Residence di bangun diatas lahan seluas 4,181 m2 dengan dua tower. Total unit yang tersedia di apartemen ini adalah 338.
 
Agar penghuni merasa nyaman, Padina Residence menyediakan fasilitas seperti, kolam renang, jacuzzi, retail/mini market, laundry, ruang serbaguna, google room dengan akses internet sangat cepat, gym, tempat bermain anak, dan tentunya masih banyak lagi.
 
Tipe unit apartemen yang ditawarkan oleh Padina Residence beragam, antara lain tipe 1BR, tipe 2BRm dan tipe loft.

meta.address: Jl. Jalur Sutera Barat Kav 20 Alam Sutera, Tangerang, Banten, Indonesia 15143
meta.desc_en:
The newest and luxurious Alam Sutera's project, The Lana is located at the heart of CBD Alam Sutera. The apartment is surrounded by public facilities, shopping center: Mall @ Alam Sutera, Living World, Giant Hypermarket, LOKA Supermarket, Pasar Delapan, Lotte Mart Wholesale, education: Binus University, Santa Laurensia School, place of worship : Santo Laurentius Church, office: Synergy Building, The Prominent Office Tower, and hospital: Omni Hospital

The Lana offers choice of spacious and fully furnished type one, two, and three bedroom ranging from 57 sqm to 141 sqm. The apartment consists a full range of facilities on ground (gardens, BBQ area, sports center including gym, sauna, indoor & outdoor children playground, various water features dan outdoor party deck) and on the top of the roof (Sky Gardens, Plunge Pool, Grilling Station 50 meter infinity pool).

Primarily targeting the aspirational yuppy class and young trendy families, The Lana calls for the architect to deliver a project that is livable, open and green, with abundant facilities and public spaces that encourages social interaction, to give young urbanite residents respite from the confines of their apartment units resulting in a better quality of life. The apartment units are specified with top quality fit-out and planned with efficient and functional unit layouts.
meta.desc_in:
Apartemen mewah terbaru Alam Sutera The LANA terletak di jantung CBD Alam Sutera. Apartemen ini dikelilingi oleh berbagai fasilitas publik, seperti pusat perbelanjaan: Mall @ Alam Sutera, Living World, Giant Hypermarket, LOKA Supermarket, Pasar Delapan, Lotte Mart Wholesale, pusat pendidikan : Binus University, Santa Laurensia School, tempat ibadah: Santo Laurentius Church, [erkantoran Synergy Building, The Prominent Office Tower, dan rumah sakit : Omni Hospital

The Lana menawarkan pilihan tipe satu, dua, dan tiga kamar tidur dengan ukuran yang luas serta telah dilengkapi dengan furintur. Luas kamar mulai dari 57 hingga 141 meter persegi. Berbagai Fasilitas pada tingkatan lantai apartemen The LANA seperti taman, area pesta kebun, sarana olahraga, gym, sauna, tempat bermain anak dan dalam ruangan, berbagai wahana air dan tempat untuk pesta) dan lantai atas (Sky Gardens, Plunge Pool, Grilling Station, 50 meter infinity pool) 

Dengan menargetkan menengah atas dan keluarga muda, The Lana memanfaatkan arsitek untuk menyampaikan proyek hunian yang hidup, dan hijau, dan di lengkapi berbagai macam fasilitas dan ruang untuk interaksi sosial, dan juga meningkatkan kualitas hidup penghuninya. Unit - unit apartemen di lengkapi dengan kualitas terbaik dan di rancang secara efisien dan fungsional.

meta.address: Jl. Sutan Syahrir no.50, Lippo Karawaci, Curug Neglasari, Tangerang, Banten, Indonesia 15811
meta.desc_en:
Amartapura is one of the apartments in Tangerang, Banten. The location of these apartments is so positioned as adjacent to Lippo Karawaci and Universitas Pelita Harapan (UPH). Aside from the students, most of the inhabitants Amartapura are expatriates.
 
Apartment Amartapura consists of two towers, Tower A (King) and Tower B (Queen). The towers had 52 and 41 floors, respectively. The second tower is often called Tower King and Queen.
 
Apartment Amartapura offers three types of units, namely studio, one bedroom, and two bedrooms.
 
Apartment Amartapura also provides facilities for the residents, among others: the swimming pool, fitness center, restaurant, children's playground, atm center, and security personnel on guard 24 hours.
meta.desc_in:
Amartapura adalah salah satu apartemen di daerah Tangerang, Banten. Lokasi apartemen ini begitu strategis karena berdekatan dengan Lippo Karawaci dan Universitas Pelita Harapan (UPH). Selain dari kalangan mahasiswa, kebanyakan penghuni Amartapura adalah ekspatriat.
 
Apartemen Amartapura ini terdiri dari dua tower yaitu tower A dan tower B Yang masing-masing memiliki ketinggian 52 dan 41 lantai. Kedua tower ini sering disebut Tower King and Queen. Amartapura adalah tower tertinggi pertama di daerah Tangerang.
 
Apartemen Amartapura menawarkan tiga tipe unit, yaitu studio, 1 kamar tidur, dan 2 kamar tidur.
 
Apartemen Amartapura juga menyediakan fasilitas bagi penghuninya, antara lain: kolam renang, pusat kebugaran, restoran, taman bermain anak, atm centre, dan personel keamanan yang berjaga 24 jam.

meta.address: Jl. Kyai Haji Hasyim Ashari No.89, Sudimara Pinang, Pinang, Tangerang, Banten, Indonesia 15145
meta.desc_en:
Palm Regency is built on an area of 4,500 sqm, with the mixed-use concept. The apartment is located in quite strategic area of Tangerang. Because it is only 5 minutes from Bintaro Jaya, 10 minutes from Karang Tengah Toll Gate, and 10 minutes to the Living World/Alam Sutera.
 
Palm Regency is one apartment tower with a total 804 units, with two floors dedicated as a mall. In this apartment, here is one exclusive floor, "The Emerald 8", with spacious units, luxury, special service, and security system.
 
To add to the comfort of the occupants, Palm Regency provides modern and complete facilities. Among others, swimming pool for adults and children, children's playground, gardens, BBQ area, sky lounge and living room, jogging track, spa, fitness center, and a ballroom.
 
Palm Regency offers several types of units, such as Studio Superior, Studio Deluxe, and 2-Bedrooms.
meta.desc_in:
Palm Regency dibangun di atas lahan seluas 4.500 m2, dengan konsep mix-use project. Apartemen yang terletak di Tangerang ini cukup strategis, karena hanya berjarak 5 menit dari Bintaro Jaya, 10 menit dari Pintu Tol Karang Tengah, dan 10 menit ke Living World/Alam Sutera.
 
Palm Regency adalah apartemen satu tower dengan total unit 804, dengan dua lantai yang didedikasikan sebagai mall. Di apartemen ini terdapat 1 lantai eksklusif, “The Emerald 8”, dengan unit luas, mewah, layanan serta pengamanan khusus.
 
Untuk menambah kenyaman para penghuni, Palm Regency menyediakan fasilitas modern dan lengkap. Antara lain, kolam renang untuk dewasa dan anak, taman bermain anak-anak, taman, area BBQ, sky and living room lounge, jogging track, spa, pusat kebugaran, dan ballroom.
 
Palm Regency menawarkan beberapa jenis unit, antara lain Studio Superior, Studio Deluxe, dan 2-Bedrooms.

meta.address: Jl. Lippo Karawaci Tangerang, Tangerang, Banten, Indonesia 15115
meta.desc_en:
Parc is a luxurious apartment, which located in the strategic area of Lippo Karawaci. It is strategic due to the close distance to renowned university (Pelita Harapan), hospitals, and shopping malls.  This apartment also has high accessibility, thanks to Toll Road Jakarta – Merak, shuttle bus, and train station. Besides, its strategic location and high accessibility, this apartment offered more values to its occupants, such as environmentally friendly, semi-private elevator, providing box for AC and clothes container, modern windows concept, and a beautiful view directly onto the golf course and a sky park. Parc Apartment consisted of 34 floors and on each floor has 14 apartment units.

To increase the comfort of its occupants, Apartment Parc also provides various indoor facilities. Among others, swimming pool, playground, jogging track, garden, laundry, fitness center, mini market, a BBQ area, a large parking area, access card, CCTV, security 24 hours, and many more.
The type of units that offered at Parc Apartments are also diverse. Including, one bedroom unit (37 sqm – 40 sqm), unit 2 bedroom + study (77 sqm – 80 sqm), 3 bedroom corner unit (95 sqm), and 3 bedroom corner unit + study + maid (115 sqm).
meta.desc_in:
Apartemen Emery Parc adalah sebuah apartemen yang mewah yang berada di kawasan strategies Lippo Karawaci. Kawasan ini strategis karena dekat dengan universitas yang ternama seperti Universitas Pelita Harapan, rumah sakit, dan pusat perbelanjaan. Apartemen ini juga mempunyai keunggulan lainnya yaitu ramah lingkungan, semi private lift, box untuk tempat AC dan jemur pakaian, konsep jendela modern, pemandangan yang indah langsung ke lapangan golf dan sky park. Apartemen Parc terdiri atas 34 lantai, dan di setiap lantainya ada 14 unit apartemen.

Untuk menambah kenyamanan penghuninya, Apartemen Emery Parc juga menyediakan banyak fasilitas indoor, seperti kolam renang, taman bermain, jogging track, taman, laundry, pusat kebugaran, mini market, area BBQ, area parkir yang luas, kartu akses, CCTV, keamanan 24 jam, dan masih banyak lagi.
Tipe unit yang ditawarkan di Apartemen Emery Parc pun sangat beragam. Di antaranya unit 1 bedroom (37 m2 – 40 m2), unit 2 bedroom+study (77 m2 – 80 m2), unit 3 bedroom corner (95 m2), dan unit 3 bedroom corner+study+maid (115 m2).

meta.address: Jl. Raya Perancis, Dadap, Tangerang, Banten, Indonesia 15810
meta.desc_en:
As the name suggests, the Grand Dadap Apartment is a vertical residential which located in Dadap, Tangerang. The apartment is built with the concept of the superblock, in which in the same complex there is commercial and residential area (shophouses and shopping centers). The location is very strategic because it has direct access to Terminal 4 Soekarno-Hatta International Airport. Also, there are also other public facilities are available near the Grand Dadap Apartment, including schools, colleges, shopping centers, supermarkets, hospitals, and much more.

Internal facilities provided by the Grand Dadap Apartment for its occupants quite complete. Among others: swimming pool, garden, children's playground, jogging track, laundry, fitness center, lobby, CCTV, 24-hour security, and others.

Type of units offered also varies, such as Studio, 1BR, 2BR, and 3BR.
meta.desc_in:
Seperti namanya, Grand Dadap Apartment adalah hunian vertikal yang berlokasi di daerah Dadap, Tangerang. Apartemen ini dibangun dengan konsep kawasan superblock, di mana dalam satu kompleks yang sama terdapat area residensial dan komersial (ruko-ruko dan pusat perbelanjaan). Lokasi ini sangat strategis karena memiliki akses langsung ke terminal 4 Bandara Internasional Soekarno-Hatta. Selain itu, ada juga fasilitas umum lainnya yang tersedia di dekat Grand Dadap Apartment, termasuk sekolah, kampus, pusat perbelanjaan, supermarket, rumah sakit, dan masih banyak lagi.

Fasilitas internal yang disediakan oleh Grand Dadap Apartment bagi penghuninya cukup lengkap. Antara lain: kolam renang, taman, taman bermain anak- anak, jogging track, laundry, pusat kebugaran, lobby, CCTV, keamanan 24 jam, dan lain- lain.

Tipe unit yang ditawarkan juga beragam, seperti Studio, 1BR, 2BR, dan 3BR

meta.address: Jl. R.E. Martadinata No.219 Ciputat, , Tangerang Selatan, Banten, Indonesia 15411
meta.desc_en:
Ciputat Resort is an apartment middle-class, which located in Ciputat, South Tangerang. Although it is not located in Jakarta, this apartment still considered strategic, due to it only one step from Lebak Bulus - South Jakarta, which high accessibility to public transport infrastructure such as mini-bus and bus, TransJakarta, toll roads, and the MRT which will be completed in 2018. Also, the apartment is also close to external facilities such as schools, hospitals, and shopping malls.

Ciputat Resort Apartment designed with the resort architectural style that would make the apartment occupants felt close to nature.

Facilities are provided for added comfort of the occupants; include a swimming pool, garden, children's playground, gym, spa, fitness center, a large parking area, and much more.

Type of units offered in Ciputat Resort Apartment also diverse, including Studio, 1BR and 2BR.
meta.desc_in:
Ciputat Resort Apartment adalah apartemen kelas menengah yang berada di kawasan Ciputat, Tangerang Selatan. Meskipun bukan di Jakarta, kawasan ini hanya selangkah dari Lebak Bulus – Jakarta Selatan, yang memiliki banyak akses ke infrastruktur transportasi umum seperti angkutan kota, TransJakarta, jalan tol, dan MRT yang akan selesai pada tahun 2018. Selain itu, apartemen ini juga dekat dengan fasilitas eksternal seperti sekolah, rumah sakit, dan pusat perbelanjaan.
Ciputat Resort Apartment dirancang dengan gaya arsitektur bernuansa resort dan akan membuat penghuni apartemen serasa dekat dengan alam.

Fasilitas yang disediakan untuk menambah kenyamanan para penghuni cukup lengkap, antara lain kolam renang, taman, taman bermain anak-anak, gym, spa, pusat kebugaran, area parkir yang luas, dan masih banyak lagi.

Tipe unit yang ditawarkan di Ciputat Resort Apartment juga beragam, antara lain Studio, 1BR, dan 2BR.

meta.address: Jl. Jalur Sutera Blok a No.18, Panunggangan Tim., Pinang, Tangerang, Banten, Indonesia 15143
meta.desc_en:
Cambio Lofts is an apartment that located in a very strategic area in Alam Sutera. This location has a high accessibility can be reached through Tol Jakarta - Merak (7 minutes from the toll gate) and Jalan Raya Serpong. Also, this apartment is also close to the Soekarno-Hatta International Airport with a distance of 30-45 minutes.

Cambio Lofts is surrounded by a variety of external facilities. Among other restaurants in the area Flavor Bliss, Market 8, Omni Hospital, Mecure Hotel, Living World Mall, School of Santa Laurensia, Giant Hypermarket, University Binus Alam Sutera, University of UBM Alam Sutera, Convention Center Alam Sutera Mall Alam Sutera, and CBD Nature Silk.
meta.desc_in:
Apartemen Cambio Lofts berada di area yang sangat strategis di Alam Sutera. Lokasi ini memiliki aksesibilitas tinggi yang dapat dicapai melalui Tol Jakarta – Merak (7 menit dari pintu tol) dan Jalan Raya Serpong. Selain itu, apartemen ini juga dekat dengan Bandara Internasional Soekarno-Hatta dengan jarak tempuh 30 – 45 menit.
 
Apartemen Combio Lofts dikelilingi berbagai fasilitas eksternal. Di antaranya restoran di kawasan Flavor Bliss, Pasar 8, Omni Hospital, Mecure Hotel, Living World Mall, Sekolah Santa Laurensia, Giant Hypermarket, Universitas Binus Alam Sutera, Universitas UBM Alam Sutera, Convention Center Alam Sutera, Mall Alam Sutera, dan CBD Alam Sutera.
 
Fasilitas yang dimiliki Apartemen Combio Lofts cukup lengkap, di antaranya: kolam renang, jogging track, spa, gym, pusat kebugaran, taman bermain anak- anak, area parkir, CCTV, ruang serbaguna, dan keamanan 24 jam.
 
Apartemen Combio Lofts menawarkan lima tipe unit, yaitu 1 bedroom (37-51 m2), 2 bedroom (53-73 m2), 3 bedroom (58-60 m2), 4 bedroom (84-86 m2), dan yang terakhir penthouse (86-145 m2).

meta.address: Jl. KH Mas Mansyur Kav. 35, Tanah Abang, Jakarta Pusat, DKI Jakarta, Indonesia 12180
meta.desc_en:
Located in the prime area of Jakarta, Sudirman Park is very strategic and has accessibility to the business district, A class shopping centers, and top notch universities. It makes this apartment suitable for a business person, newlyweds, or parents with children. Besides that, it is closely located to other prime locations, such as Gatot Subroto, Kuningan, and MH. Thamrin. The residents of this apartment can also avoid traffic by using public transport that can be reached easily, such as train from Sudirman Train Station and Transjakarta.

This apartment has many facilities, including swimming pool, sauna, fitness centre, 24-hour convenience store, and 24-hour clinic. With various facilities, Sudirman Park is considered as a medium-end apartment. Sudirman Park offers three unit type, with 1, 2, and 3 bedrooms. Each unit is quite spacious compared to other apartments in Jakarta area.
meta.desc_in:
Sudirman Park terletak tepat di jantung kota Jakarta, sangat strategis dengan aksesibilitas tinggi. Antara lain: kawasan bisnis, pusat perbelanjaan kelas atas seperti Grand Indonesia dan Plaza Indonesia, serta universitas berkualitas. Sehingga, apartemen ini cocok untuk berbagai macam penghuni. Mulai dari pebisnis, pasangan yang baru menikah, atau pasangan dengan anak-anak. Selain itu, apartemen ini juga dekat ke lokasi utama di Jakarta seperti Gatot Subroto, Rasuna Said, MH. Thamrin. Meskipun Jakarta penuh kemacetan, penghuni apartemen ini dapat menghindari macet dengan memanfaatkan transportasi umum yang mudah dijangkau, misalnya kereta dari Stasiun Sudirman dan Transjakarta.

Apartemen ini memiliki berbagai fasilitas, di antaranya kolam renang, sauna, pusat kebugaran, mini market 24 jam, dan klinik 24 jam. Dengan fasilitas yang dimilikinya, apartemen ini termasuk dalam kategori medium-end. Sudirman Park menawarkan tiga jenis unit, dengan 1, 2, dan 3 kamar tidur. Setiap unit memiliki ukuran yang cukup luas dibandingkan apartemen lain di Jakarta.

meta.address: Jl. Benjamin Sueb Blok D7, Pademangan, Jakarta Pusat, DKI Jakarta, Indonesia 10720
meta.desc_en:
Springhill Terrace Residences consists of 2 towers with 368 units each. It is a part of the big project by Springhill Group, located in Kemayoran, next to Royale Springhill apartments. The building uses green living concepts with Grade A facilities, from sky lounge, rooftop garden, and balcony at each unit. It is also strategically located near international schools (Universal School, Gandhi International School, Jubilee International School), Hospitals (Mitra Kemayoran Hospital, Hermina Hospital), convention center (Jakarta International Expo), Mangga Dua, Pasar Baru, Sunter, Kelapa Gading, and Ancol. 

Springhill Terrace offers impressive facilities, including swimming pool, security 24-hours, beauty salon, fitness center, spa, cafe, and mini market. The apartment provides choice spacious and modern design of type studio, type 2 bedrooms, and 3 bedrooms. It makes the apartment a perfect residence for young professional, couple, and family. Springhill Terrace is medium end urban living with nature concept brought greeneries and serene surrounding to the complex.
meta.desc_in:
Springhill Terrace Residences terdiri dari 2 tower dengan 368 unit per tower nya. Apartemen ini merupakan bagian dari proyek besar Springhill, terletak di sebelah Royale Springhill Apartment. Gedungnya menggunakan konsep hijau dengan fasilitas Grade A seperti sky lounge, rooftop garden dan balkon di setiap unit. Letak apartemen ini strategis, dekat ke sekolah-sekolah internasional (Universal School, Gandhi International School, Jubilee International School), rumah sakit (RS. Mitra Kemayoran, RS. Hermina), convention center (JI Expo), Mangga Dua, Pasar Baru, Sunter, Kelapa Gading dan Ancol. Springhill Terrace memberikan fasilitas dengan kualitas terbaik untuk penghuninya termasuk kolam renang, keamanan 24 jam, salon kecantikan, pusat kebugaran, spa, kafe, dan mini market.

Apartemen ini menawarkan tipe studio, 2 kamar, dan 3 kamar dengan ukuran luas dan desain modern. Sehingga, apartemen ini dapat menjadi pilihan bagi profesional, pasangan muda, bahkan keluarga. Springhill Terrace adalah apartemen medium end yang menawarkan hunian di perkotaan dengan konsep alam dan membawa suasana asri dan nyaman di sekitar apartemen.

meta.address: Jl. K.H. Mas Mansyur no. 121, Karet, Jakarta Pusat, DKI Jakarta, Indonesia 12920
meta.desc_en:
Citylofts represents a new and better way of life for inner-city living and working. Citylofts is a new concept of building, Small Office Home Office which combines living residence and office within one area. Feel the benefits of double volume lofts style living. Lofts-style living offers all of the advantages of an inner city home and also has the benefits of a flexible floor plan, which will enable changes of use and modification to suit users needs. Located on top of Citywalk Mall, Citylofts offers its residents simplicity to live in modern life.

Citylofts has three types of unit that you can choose, which are the studio, 1 Bed Room, and 2 Bed Rooms. Each unit has more than adequate size, and it will be a decent choice whether as sanctuary or office. Further, the room is fully furnished with high-quality furniture. Citylofts has a host of facilities for its residents, including swimming pool, jogging track, tennis court, and a fitness center. Mini market and laundry are also available to provide residents' daily needs. 24 hours security and CCTV also offered to secure the apartment along with private parking spot. Citylofts is a medium-end apartment and perfect place as residence or office.
meta.desc_in:
Citylofts menawarkan gaya hidup dan bekerja yang lebih baik. Citylofts dibangun dengan konsep Small Office Home Office yang menggabungkan rumah hunian dengan kantor. Dengan letaknya yang sangat dekat dari daerah bisnis Jakarta Sudirman dan Thamrin, penghuni tidak perlu kesulitan menuju daerah perkantoran. Selain itu, mall ini terletak diatas Citywalk mall yang dapat memenuhi segala kebutuhan sehari-hari penghuninya. Pusat kota Jakarta juga dekat dengan apartemen ini sehingga Anda dengan mudah menjalani hidup anda.

Citylofts memiliki tipe studio, tipe 1 kamar dan 2 kamar. Dengan ukuran tiap unit yang luas, penghuni dapat menggunakan apartemen sebagai hunian ataupun sebagai kantor. Tiap unit telah dilengkapi dengan perabotan berkualitas tinggi yang membuat penghuni nyaman. Apartemen ini juga memiliki fasilitas penunjang seperti kolam renang, lintasan lari, lapangan tenis, dan pusat kebugaran. Penghuni juga tidak perlu kesulitan memenuhi kebutuhan sehari-hari karena terdapat mini market dan laundry. Keamanan apartemen ini juga terjamin dengan adanya petugas keamanan 24 jam, kamera pengawas, dan lahan parkir pribadi. Citylofts memenuhi segala kebutuhan penghuni, baik kehidupan pribadi maupun urusan bisnis yang dapat dinikmati dengan harga medium-end.

meta.address: Jl. Landas Pacu Selatan Blok A-1 Kav. 2, Kemayoran, Jakarta Pusat, DKI Jakarta, Indonesia 10630
meta.desc_en:
Mediterania Palace Apartment is strategically located near the IT centers of Mangga Dua, Glodok, Roxy, and other points of interest such as Thamrin, Sudirman, Menteng, Kuningan, Kelapa Gading. It has easy highway access, 15 minutes to Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, 3 minutes away from Mitra Kemayoran Hospital, Royal Progress Hospital, Satyanegara Hospital and international schools like Gandhi International School, Jubilee School, and Universal School.

Mediterania Palace Apartment offers the full range of facilities so you can feel like home, including swimming pool, sauna, fitness center, tennis court, and supermarket. The apartment also ensures its residents' security by providing 24 hours security as well as CCTV. The property offers type studio which will be a great option for single professional. Also, the fully furnished type 2 and 3 Bedrooms are also available for you and your family. With all of the advantages, Mediterania Palace Apartment is an impressive apartment with the medium-end price.
meta.desc_in:
Mediterania Palace Apartemen berada di lokasi strategis sehingga Anda bisa dengan mudah mencapai pusat IT di Mangga Dua, Glodok, Roxy dan point of interest lainnya seperti Thamrin, Sudirman, Menteng, Kuningan, Kelapa Gading. Dengan akses jalan tol yang mudah, hanya 15 menit dari Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, 3 menit dari sekolah internasional seperti Gandhi International School Jubilee School dan Universal School serta akses rumah sakit seperti RS Mitra Kemayoran, RS Royal Progress dan RS Satyanegara.

Mediterania Palace Apartemen memiliki fasilitas untuk membuat Anda merasa seperti di rumah, seperti kolam renang, sauna, pusat kebugaran, lapangan tenis, dan supermarket. Apartemen ini memastikan kemanan Anda dengan menyediakan keamanan 24 jam serta kamera pengawas. Hunian ini memiliki tipe studio sehingga dapat dihuni oleh profesional atau yang belum menikah. Selain itu, terdapat tipe 2 kamar tidur dan 3 kamar tidur lengkap dengan furnitur yang dapat menjadi pilihan bagi Anda dan keluarga Anda. Dengan segala keunggulannya, Mediterania Palace Apartemen merupakan hunian berkualitas dengan kisaran harga medium-end.

meta.address: Jl. Benyamin Sueb Kav. A6, Kemayoran, Jakarta Utara, DKI Jakarta, Indonesia 14410
meta.desc_en:
The Boutique Apartment is a one tower apartment with 1, 2, and 3-bed rooms units. The apartment is near to urban facilities in Kemayoran, an area surrounded by golf area, making the area very fresh and green. Another advantage of this apartment is that the area is safe from the traffic jam and flood. It is also steps away from Sunter and Ancol, surrounded by international schools (Gandhi International School, Jubilee School, and Universal School), hospitals (RS Mitra Kemayoran), and Jakarta International Expo.The residents of Boutique Apartment can enjoy facilities with international standards, including a connecting indoor and outdoor swimming pool, flying jogging track & garden, 2 balconies in every unit, 2 views (city and sea), 24-hour room service, 24-hour security, and multi-purpose room.

The apartment is available in three unit type: 1BR, 2BR, and 3BR, making it suitable for many people. For individuals looking exclusivity and luxury, the penthouse can be their chosen unit. The Boutique Apartment is a high-end apartment that offers comfortable living for its residents.
meta.desc_in:
The Boutique Apartment adalah sebuah apartemen 1 tower dengan unit 1, 2 dan 3 kamar tidur. Lokasinya dekat dengan fasilitas urban di Kemayoran, area yang dikelilingi padang golf sehingga lingkungannya sangat hijau dan menyejukkan. Apartemen ini juga memiliki keunggulan lokasi yang sangat strategis di pusat bisnis ibukota; bebas macet, dan bebas banjir. Selain itu juga dekat ke Sunter dan Ancol, dikelilingi sekolah internasional (Gandhi International School, Jubilee School dan Universal School), Rumah Sakit (RS Mitra Kemayoran), dan Jakarta International Expo. The Boutique Apartment juga memiliki fasilitas berstandar internasional, antara lain: kolam renang indoor dan outdoor yang tersambung, flying jogging track & garden, 2 balkon per unit, 2 view (kota & laut), layanan ruangan 24 jam, keamanan 24 jam dan ruang serba guna.

Apartemen ini memiliki tipe 1 Bed Rooms, 2 Bed Rooms, dan 3 Bed Rooms sehingga cocok bagi penghuni dari berbagai kalangan. Tersedia juga tipe penthouse bagi mereka yang menginginkan eksklusifitas dan kemewahan. The Boutique Apartment merupakan apartemen dengan kategori high-end yang menjanjikan kenyamanan bagi setiap penghuninya.
